department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Commercial boat maintenance and repair services Awarded at competitive prices.
tags: Public Works and Government Services Canada
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Information

* **Title (English):** F3065-221786 - CCGS Constable Carriere, Five-Year Survey and Starboard Engine Replacement
* **Title (French):** F3065-221786 - NGCC Constable Carrière, Inspection quinquennale et remplacement du moteur tribord
* **Reference Number:** WS3684911864-Doc3684940429
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3684911864

#### Tender Details

* **Publication Date:** 11 October 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** 3 November 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 31 March 2024

#### Tender Status

* **Tender Status (English):** Expired
* **Tender Status (French):** Expiré

#### UNSPSC Codes

* *25111500 - Commercial marine craft
* *25111510 - Salvage ships
* *25111514 - Icebreaker
* *25111603 - Rescue ships or boats
* *78182000 - Water transport vessel maintenance and repair services

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Gabriel Piras (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** `gabriel.piras@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca`

#### Bid Requirements

* All required supporting documents and bid submissions must be received by 2:00 PM EST on 3 November 2022.
* Late bids will be considered non-responsive.

#### Bid Description

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), invites bids for the acquisition of ship repair work, including dry docking, on the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Constable Carriere, located in Halifax, NS. Please refer to the solicitation for all details related to this bid. You can find more information on the bid at the following URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14334362?extsite=MTQzMzQzNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1
